item.title: What is GraalVM ?
item.description: It happened the beginning of the year when I was scanning my Twitter feed. I came across a tweet announcing one of the GraalVM release candidates that were followed by a series of other interesting tweets.

item.title: Cookies in Chrome and Safari
item.description: You probably heard about Facebook - Cambridge Analytica scandal. You must hear about the GDPR in the EU. Moreover, there are probably more.
